Articles.Content:
After searching and searching, I have not been able to find anyone who has made a Cylon Raider in KSP. Tons of Vipers, but no Cylons. So I made one. It's no masterpiece by any means, but hopefully this will inspire someone to make a truly incredible replica. And just to be even, I threw a Viper Mk II together and put it in as well:P

Made 100% stock and flown with no cheats/hacks. Hope you enjoy!

gGATORr

I was planning one once I got my Viper Mk VII to actually fly correctly, but since it flies like a brick, well...

Cool job!
Haha thanks man! I'd like to see your viper if you could post a pic!
